resources.string: Welcome to Tuticorin Airport Mobile App

Tuticorin Airport is a domestic airport located in the southern part of Tamil Nadu, India. Airport is located in Vagaikulam at a distance of 16.9 km from the city of Tuticorin. IATA (International Air Transport Association) code for Tuticorin Airport is TCR.
Tuticorin airport has single terminal and a gate with X-RAY baggage facility.
Wheel chair facilities available in airport for physically challenged passengers at free of cost
Trolleys are available at free of cost
Car parking facility is available at airport in reasonable rate.
Tuticorin airport is well connected with the city bus services and taxi services.
City bus stations in located about 1.5km from Tuticorin Airport.
Tuticorin Railway station is located at distance of around 7km away from airport
Flight arrival and timings are subject to change.Please contact airlines or refer the airline website.
Flight departure and timings are subject to change.Please contact airlines or refer the airline website.
Flight destination and timings are subject to change.Please refer the airline website or contact airlines for correct information.
